_header: We shall maken a joly castle
_description: An allusion to a popular song in a sermon — six lines (or three long lines)

CamJes13.Transcription:
We schun maken a ioly castelon a bank brysden a brymmeschal no
                    man comyn therynbut ȝyf he kun swymmeor buth be haue a both of
                    louefor to seykyn ynne
